title: Bug 34499Can't select styles in combo example
description: Bug 34499Can't select styles in combo example RC2LinuxGTK1. Also, ifthe SWT.BORDER style is never usable it probably shouldn't appear in the tab?
OB: The checkboxes appear enabled but clicking in them only causes them toflash.4. Now SWT.READONLY can be selected, but SWT.BORDER still cannot.The checkboxes should appear disabled when they're not applicable.
SR: Launch the ControlExample and go to the Combo tab.2. With SWT.SIMPLE selected, try to select SWT.READONLY or SWT.BORDER.3. Select SWT.DROPDOWN and repeat step 2.5.
